headline: Why Cognizant Technology Solutions Stock Triumphed on Thursday
summary: The company is harnessing artificial intelligence (AI) to enhance its offerings.  IT services and consulting company Cognizant Technology Solutions (NASDAQ: CTSH) enjoyed a buoyant Thursday on the stock market.  For its first quarter, Cognizant's revenue totaled almost $5.12 billion, representing a 7.5% gain over the same period of 2024.
